customers.usage_stats: Apple orders increased from $8,105 in March to $27,671 in April; Google placed $14,421 in POs.

team.operation_notes: Service was turned off for 4 days due to lack of capacity. High scrap rate impacted gross margin.

product_updates.description: Apple started piloting the reserved machine product and developed procurement automation integrations.
product_updates.impact: Potential $120K annual contract per machine if pilot succeeds.

product_updates.description: Became an official Google parts supplier; Google placed $14,421 in POs so far.
product_updates.impact: Potential pilot of reserved machine product with Google.

events.description: Service was turned off for 4 days due to capacity limitations.

notes: Scrap rate was high this month, impacting gross margin. Bottleneck issues identified in product workflow. Company is seeking intros to Meta Reality Labs.
